text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump China was in lockdown for 2 mths & Italy went ino lockdown March 9. Italy coronavirus deaths rise by 602 in a day, lifting total death toll to 6,077. Our 15 day social distancing cames to an end next week? I doubt that!
